what: An Example of the Records of the Bills
title: The Records of the Bills
text: First, ’ll import legisTaiwan, ’ll retrieve data January 20th Republic China year 106 March 10th Republic China year 111. get_bills function returns list contains query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad (.D) , end_date_ad (.D), start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info, data.

what: An Example of the Records of the Bills
title: An Example of Party Caucus Negotiation
text: First, ’ll import legisTaiwan. Next, ’ll retrieve data September 23rd Republic China year 111 January 19th Republic China year 112. Unlike date parameter get_bills(), needs formatted Republic China year string “/”. reason due inconsistencies API’s parameter design. next version, 0.2 , aim overcome issue unify date format within legisTaiwan framework.

title: User Manual
text: get_parlquestions(): parliamentary questions asked legislators 提供議事日程本院委員之質詢事項資訊 (自第8屆) get_meetings(): spoken meeting records 委員發言 get_caucus_meetings(): meeting records cross-caucus session 提供公報之黨團協商資訊 (自第8屆) get_executive_response(): questions answered executives提供公報質詢事項行政院答復資訊 (自第8屆) get_public_debates(): public debates 提供公報之國是論壇資訊，並包含書面意見自 (自第8屆) get_speech_video(): full video information meetings committees 提供立法院院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 (自第9屆)

title: User Manual
text: get_committee_record(): records reviewed items committees 提供委員會會議審查之議案項目 (自第8屆) get_bills(): records bills 法律提案 (能取得最早日不詳，待檢查) get_bills_2(): records legislators government bill proposals 提供委員及政府之議案提案資訊 (自第8屆) passed_legislation(): legislation information passed third reading 提供公報院會紀錄之三讀通過議案資訊。(自第8屆第1會期起) coming soon

title: User Manual
text: get_variable_info(): API’s endpoint user manuals 使用說明文件 review_session_info(): session period year formatted Minguo (ROC) calendar. 屆期年對照表 get_legislators(): legislator demographics 提供委員基本資料  + Check Required: user manual seems inconsistent actual data. Please check discussion 參數設定後與資料取得不一致，待確認。

title: Quick Start
text: legisTaiwan R package accessing Taiwan Legislative Yuan API. goal legisTaiwan make quickly instantly download Taiwan’s legislative data, digitized textual video records research project analyze public policies.
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("davidycliao/legisTaiwan", force = TRUE) library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ## #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ##

what: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R

text: legisTaiwan designed download real-time archives Taiwan legislative data easily. package includes many streamlined functions access Taiwan Legislative Yuan API R without hassle runarounds.

title: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("davidycliao/legisTaiwan", force = TRUE) library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ## #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ##

title: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
text: legisTaiwan requires stable internet connection retrieve data API. functions can fetch data spanning long period, tend bandwidth-intensive due size datasets. plan download data extended period, recommend using get_variable_info() first verify current file sizes API manual. Also, consider writing batch retrieval process appropriate handlers track progress file input, ensuring completeness requested data.

what: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
text: Records Bills: 法律提案

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
code: get_bills(start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, proposer = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
text: start_date numeric. Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g., 1090101. end_date numeric. Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g., 1090102. proposer default value NULL, indicating bills proposed legislators included start end dates. verbose logical. Specifies whether get_bills print detailed output retrieving data. default value TRUE.

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
text: list, contains: title Records cross-caucus sessions query_time Query timestamp retrieved_number Number observations retrieved meeting_unit Meeting unit start_date_ad Start date POSIXct format end_date_ad End date POSIXct format start_date Start date ROC Taiwan calendar url URL retrieved JSON data variable_names Variable names tibble dataframe manual_info Official manual. See https://www.ly.gov.tw/Pages/List.aspx?nodeid=153 use get_variable_info("get_bills") data tibble dataframe following variables: sessionPeriod Session period sessionTimes Session count meetingTimes Proposal date billName Bill name billProposer Primary proposer billCosignatory Co-signatories bill billStatus Status bill date_ad Date Gregorian calendar

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
text: get_bills function returns list contains query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info, data.

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
text: retrieve user manual details data frame, use get_variable_info("get_bills"). checks required user manual seems inconsistent actual data.

title: The Records of the Bills: 法律提案 — get_bills
code: if (FALSE) { ## Query bill records by a date range in the Taiwan ROC calendar format get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1070310, verbose = FALSE)  ## Query bill records by a date range and a specific legislator get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1070310,  proposer = "孔文吉")  ## Query bill records by a date range and multiple legislators get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1060510,  proposer = "孔文吉&鄭天財") }

text: term numeric NULL value. Data available 8th term onwards. Default set 8. 參數必須為數值。資料從第8屆開始，預設值為8。 session_period integer, numeric, NULL. Valid options session : 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Default set NULL. 參數必須為數值。 review_session_info() provides available session periods based Minguo (Taiwan) calendar. verbose Default value TRUE. Displays details retrieved data, including number, URL, computing time.

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals: 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: David Liao (davidycliao@gmail.com)
